meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>angle</kanji> <kanji>degree</kanji> is just an <vocabulary>angle</vocabulary>. 90 degrees? 160 degrees? They're all still angles when you come down to it.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
